text: illeogalodoe seongseoui baegseongdeul-iyeo neohuiga guyaggwa sin-yaggwa neohui junim-eulobuteo gyesidoen geos-eul junsuhal ttaekkaji neohuineun amuleon indodoem-eul badji moshal geos-ila junim-eulobuteo geudaeege gyesidoen geos-i bunmyeong manh-eun muliege jeog-uiwa bulsin-eul jeung-gasikina sin-ang-i eobsneun mulileul bogo seulpeohaji malla
